item.title: Loose iron cover causing continual environmental noise. The drain is nearest the Winchcombe Primary School and by the yellow road word, ‘clear’, which is part of the phrase, Keep school clear’. It is the yearly marking nearest the school side., 30th December
item.description:
By the yellow word,’clear’ ( Keep School Clear). The nearest yellow lettering to Winchcombe Primary School.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Back Lane, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sharp edged pothole getting larger by the day, 30th December
item.description:
On the right hand bend coming downhill. Pothole has been there for a couple of weeks but has got bigger over the last few days. Definitely a danger for car wheels and a significant danger to cyclists and motorcycles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Paynes Pitch, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road work sign left by side of road., 30th December
item.description:
There is an abandoned road work sign by the car park on Royal well Road. On the road not car park side of the fence. Close to the payment meter. Round the corner on St George’s Road is an abandoned traffic cone. Been there for weeks..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Well Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
